short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay updated with Quartz news! Get the daily digest on your new tab page and get your subscription's full value. (Unofficial).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you have a Quartz subscription, it sucks to forget about it and not get the full value. This (unofficial) extension brings the daily digest to your new tab page. Stay on top of the latest news by Quartz!

Install extension and hit Ctrl/Cmd + T to open a new tab.
